text: 1. The ultimate monster cookie. These look SO chewy. 2. My inner forever 13 year old self is very excited that sequin season is upon us. 3. Stanley Tucci’s kitchen organizing hack. I’ve done this for years! Sits by my stovetop. 4. Fireplace weather is also here. I could not be more excited when the temp said 46 today. 5. Wild how people are using their bundt pans! 6. I am now thisclose to putting up some christmas trees in the kids rooms. 7. TV things!! I’m rewatching Dexter. I don’t know why! It kept coming up on Netflix and I got sucked in. 8. How to reduce stress in the morning. 9. I put ceramic ghosts on our mantel and Jordan asked me why I put “toilet paper guys” up there. Ha. 10. How to break your loops and form better habits. This is good!
html:
1. The ultimate monster cookie. These look SO chewy.

2. My inner forever 13 year old self is very excited that sequin season is upon us.

3. Stanley Tucci’s kitchen organizing hack. I’ve done this for years! Sits by my stovetop.

4. Fireplace weather is also here. I could not be more excited when the temp said 46 today.

5. Wild how people are using their bundt pans!

6. I am now thisclose to putting up some christmas trees in the kids rooms.

7. TV things!! I’m rewatching Dexter. I don’t know why! It kept coming up on Netflix and I got sucked in.

8. How to reduce stress in the morning.

9. I put ceramic ghosts on our mantel and Jordan asked me why I put “toilet paper guys” up there. Ha.

10. How to break your loops and form better habits. This is good!
